snippet: The reinsurance arm of Third Point, the hedge fund run by Daniel S. Loeb, disclosed on Monday that it is seeking to raise up to $370.6 million from its forthcoming initial public offering. That shows quick growth for the nearly two-year-old...
abstract: The reinsurance arm of Third Point, the hedge fund run by Daniel S. Loeb, disclosed on Monday that it is seeking to raise up to $370.6 million from its forthcoming initial public offering. That shows quick growth for the nearly two-year-old operation.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Third Point Reinsurance Fund Arm Seeks Up to $370.6 Million in I.P.O.
